numbered_ace_sentences: 1. A reader immediately notices a pattern.
2. A greater income increases the chance of acceptance.
4. Do we understand the effect of this habit?
5. We may base decisions only on income.
6. If we base decisions only on income then we miss an opportunity.
7. The opportunity is to see something extraordinary in more than half of the population.
8. It is eye-opening to see such potential diminished.
9. It is underwhelming to see such potential diminished.
